name: Pancake
directions: In a large bowl, sift together the flour, baking powder, salt and sugar. Make a well in the center and pour in the milk, egg and melted butter; mix until smooth.
Heat a lightly oiled griddle or frying pan over medium high heat. Pour or scoop the batter onto the griddle, using approximately 1/4 cup for each pancake.
Brown on both sides and serve hot.
footnote: Tip : Aluminum foil can be used to keep food moist, cook it evenly, and make clean-up easier.

name: Breakfast Drink
directions: In a blender combine pineapple juice, bananas yogurt, strawberries, wheat germ and vanilla extract. Blend until smooth.
footnote: Tip : you can add berries for enhancing taste
